title: Cognitive Stimulation through Voice Commands
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to engage in cognitive stimulation games using natural voice commands so that I can maintain my cognitive abilities without feeling monitored.

title: Voice-Activated Appointment Reminders
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to remind me of my appointments through voice-activated alerts so that I can keep track of my schedule without feeling monitored or overwhelmed.

title: Proactive Conversation Starters for Social Inclusion
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to initiate conversations and suggest activities based on my interests, so that I feel socially connected and engaged without feeling monitored.

title: Cognitive Stimulation and Reminders
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to use voice commands to set appointment reminders and access cognitive stimulation games so that I can maintain my cognitive abilities and stay engaged without feeling monitored.

title: Error Recovery Mechanisms – Clarification Prompts for User Commands
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to ask clarification questions when I give a command that it doesn't understand, so that I can feel supported in using the system without feeling monitored or frustrated.

title: Personalized Voice Profiles for Empowering User Interaction
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want a personalized voice profile that recognizes my preferences and commands so that I can interact with ALFRED effortlessly without feeling monitored.

title: Cognitive Ease in Interaction
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to provide clear and simple voice commands to access cognitive stimulation games and set appointment reminders, so that I can maintain my cognitive abilities without feeling monitored or overwhelmed.

title: Cognitive Stimulation Reminder
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want automated reminders for my cognitive stimulation games so that I can maintain my brain fitness without feeling monitored.
